name: AddFLVotersTableIndexes2
rule:
[
	[idx: 'Voters_birth_date_idx', name: 'birth_date'],
	[idx: 'Voters_congressional_district_idx', name: 'congressional_district'],
	[idx: 'Voters_county_code_idx', name: 'county_code'],
	[idx: 'Voters_county_commission_district_idx', name: 'county_commission_district'],
	[idx: 'Voters_daytime_area_code_idx', name: 'daytime_area_code'],
	[idx: 'Voters_daytime_phone_number_idx', name: 'daytime_phone_number'],
	[idx: 'Voters_export_date_idx', name: 'export_date'],
	[idx: 'Voters_gender_idx', name: 'gender'],
	[idx: 'Voters_house_district_idx', name: 'house_district'],
	[idx: 'Voters_mailing_address_line_1_idx', name: 'mailing_address_line_1'],
	[idx: 'Voters_mailing_address_line_2_idx', name: 'mailing_address_line_2'],
	[idx: 'Voters_mailing_address_line_3_idx', name: 'mailing_address_line_3'],
	[idx: 'Voters_mailing_city_idx', name: 'mailing_city'],
	[idx: 'Voters_mailing_state_idx', name: 'mailing_state'],
	[idx: 'Voters_mailing_zipcode_idx', name: 'mailing_zipcode'],
	[idx: 'Voters_name_first_idx', name: 'name_first'],
	[idx: 'Voters_name_last_idx', name: 'name_last'],
	[idx: 'Voters_name_middle_idx', name: 'name_middle'],
	[idx: 'Voters_party_affiliation_idx', name: 'party_affiliation'],
	[idx: 'Voters_precinct_group_idx', name: 'precinct_group'],
	[idx: 'Voters_precinct_idx', name: 'precinct'],
	[idx: 'Voters_precinct_split_idx', name: 'precinct_split'],
	[idx: 'Voters_precinct_suffix_idx', name: 'precinct_suffix'],
	[idx: 'Voters_race_idx', name: 'race'],
	[idx: 'Voters_residence_address_line_1_idx', name: 'residence_address_line_1'],
	[idx: 'Voters_residence_address_line_2_idx', name: 'residence_address_line_2'],
	[idx: 'Voters_residence_city_idx', name: 'residence_city'],
	[idx: 'Voters_residence_state_idx', name: 'residence_state'],
	[idx: 'Voters_residence_zipcode_idx', name: 'residence_zipcode'],
	[idx: 'Voters_school_board_district_idx', name: 'school_board_district'],
	[idx: 'Voters_senate_district_idx', name: 'senate_district'],
	[idx: 'Voters_voter_id_idx', name: 'voter_id'],
	[idx: 'Voters_voter_status_idx', name: 'voter_status']
].each { i ->
	if(sql.firstRow("""SELECT COUNT(*) AS "ExistCount" FROM pg_class WHERE relname = :indexName""",[indexName:i.idx]).ExistCount < 1) {
		sql.executeUpdate("""CREATE INDEX "${i.idx}" ON "Florida"."Voters" USING btree ("${i.name}")""")
	}
}
